ourStory.title: Our
ourStory.subtitle: Discover how Garderie Mirabel 1&2 became a trusted partner in your children's development journey.

founding.title: How We Started
founding.description: Founded in 2015, Garderie Mirabel 1&2 began with a simple mission: to create a safe, nurturing environment where children can thrive. Our founders, passionate about early childhood education, wanted to establish a place where families feel like home and children develop confidence, creativity, and a love for learning.

mission.title: Our Mission Today
mission.description: Today, we continue to honor that vision by providing exceptional childcare services that support each child's unique development. We believe in fostering independence, creativity, and social skills through play-based learning and individualized attention.

visual.title: Built with Love
visual.description: Every corner of our facility is designed with children's safety, comfort, and development in mind.

ourTeam.title: Meet Our
ourTeam.description: Our dedicated educators bring passion, experience, and expertise to create the best environment for your children.

director.name: Marie-Claire Dubois

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our daycare services, enrollment process, and policies.
faq.contactMessage: We're here to help! Contact us directly for personalized assistance.

0.question: What are your enrollment requirements?
0.answer: We accept children aged 0-5 years. Required documents include immunization records, emergency contacts, and a completed enrollment form. We also require a tour of our facility before enrollment.

1.question: What are your operating hours?
1.answer: We are open Monday through Friday from 6:30 AM to 6:00 PM. We are closed on weekends and major holidays. Extended hours may be available upon request.

2.question: What is your fee structure?
2.answer: Our fees vary based on age group and program selection. We offer full-time and part-time options. Please contact us for current pricing and payment plans. We accept various payment methods for your convenience.

3.question: Do you offer subsidized spots?
3.answer: Yes, we participate in government subsidy programs. We can help you determine your eligibility and assist with the application process. Contact our administration for more details.

4.question: What safety measures do you have in place?
4.answer: We maintain strict safety protocols including secure entry systems, background checks for all staff, emergency preparedness plans, and regular safety drills. Our facility is regularly inspected and certified.

5.question: How do you handle medical emergencies?
5.answer: All staff are trained in first aid and CPR. We have established emergency procedures and maintain emergency contacts for all children. We work closely with local emergency services when needed.

6.question: What are your sick child policies?
6.answer: Children showing signs of illness must stay home to protect others. We follow public health guidelines for return-to-care requirements. We maintain detailed health records and communicate with parents about any health concerns.

7.question: What meals and snacks do you provide?
7.answer: We provide nutritious meals and snacks prepared fresh daily in our licensed kitchen. We accommodate dietary restrictions and allergies. Menus are planned by nutrition professionals and posted weekly.

8.question: How do you communicate with parents?
8.answer: We use multiple communication methods including daily reports, photo sharing, newsletters, and parent-teacher conferences. We maintain an open-door policy and encourage regular communication.

9.question: What is your approach to discipline?
9.answer: We use positive guidance techniques focusing on teaching appropriate behavior. Our approach emphasizes natural consequences, redirection, and helping children understand the impact of their actions.

10.question: What educational curriculum do you follow?
10.answer: We follow a play-based learning curriculum that meets provincial early learning standards. Our program focuses on social, emotional, physical, and cognitive development through age-appropriate activities.

11.question: Do you offer extracurricular activities?
11.answer: Yes, we offer various enrichment programs including music, art, physical education, and language development. These activities are integrated into our daily schedule and age-appropriate for each group.

12.question: How do you prepare children for school?
12.answer: Our kindergarten preparation program focuses on school readiness skills including social skills, independence, following routines, and academic foundations. We work closely with local schools to ensure smooth transitions.
